name: Tamakushi Casket
title: Sangonomiya Kokomi: Tamakushi Casket
desc: Wisdom yet revealed from the casket parallels tides yet unfolded by the sea.
inPlayDescription: When your Sangonomiya Kokomi, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Nereid's Ascension: Summon a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Bake-Kurage with a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) of 1; if <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Bake-Kurage is already on the field, then increase its <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) by 1 instead.While <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Ceremonial Garment exists, <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Bake-Kurage deals +1 DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Sangonomiya Kokomi to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Sangonomiya Kokomi, equip this card.After Sangonomiya Kokomi equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Nereid's Ascension once.When your Sangonomiya Kokomi, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Nereid's Ascension: Summon a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Bake-Kurage with a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) of 1; if <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Bake-Kurage is already on the field, then increase its <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) by 1 instead.While <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Ceremonial Garment exists, <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Bake-Kurage deals +1 DMG.(You must have Sangonomiya Kokomi in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
